scripts.build: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path public)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path public }; if (!(Test-Path public\css)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path public\css }; if (!(Test-Path public\js)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path public\js }; if (!(Test-Path public\pages)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path public\pages }; Copy-Item -Path index.html -Destination public; Copy-Item -Path src\css\* -Destination public\css -Recurse; Copy-Item -Path src\js\* -Destination public\js -Recurse; Copy-Item -Path src\pages\* -Destination public\pages -Recurse"
